content: the monogram coasters/mug rugs scream summer barbecues and dinner parties protect your tables and keep track of drinks when everyone gets their own personalized coaster >although the charts and tutorial are available for free on my blog 1 the full written instructions along with the charts are available for purchase in an ad-free pdf here > purchase any 4 or more regular price patterns in my ravelry shop and get 25% off no coupon code needed all of my patterns have been tested by several accomplished pattern testers and designers to ensure that you are getting a pattern free of mistakes and is easy to follow please note that all my patterns are written in standard american terms sign up for my weekly newsletter so you don t miss a thing https //view flodesk com/pages/5ea6dc1dc58c55002cfc36e6 please note that due to the nature of digital files i cannot take any refunds however i do offer customer support and will try my best to help you with the instructions you are free to sell what you make from this pattern but you may not share copy or reproduce this pattern in part or whole photographs are also copyright protected and may never be used please link back to one of my shops if selling your finished items online ©pamela dajczak 2020 1 https //www sincerelypam com/monogram-coasters-crochet-pattern/
